text: LIVE UPDATES | CONCLUDED Last Updated: March 20, 2024 at 2:48 AM EDT Updated 10 days ago By Tae Kim Jensen Huang wants the world to know Nvidia is not just a chip maker. “Nvidia builds an entire data center for AI,” the CEO said during a financial analyst Q&A session at GTC Tuesday. Huang said there is an aggregate $1 trillion of infrastructure installed inside the data center. He expects Nvidia will take a larger share of the roughly $250 billion spent a year for data center infrastructure. He noted Nvidia sells entire stack solution of systems, software, and networking – not just chips. NVIDIA Corp. NVDA (U.S.: Nasdaq) Advertisement - Scroll to Continue
